meanings.sent1: The cat vamoosed when it heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: She vamoosed from the party as soon as she saw her ex-boyfriend.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel vamoosed up the tree when it saw the dog approaching.
meanings.sent4: The magician vamoosed into thin air, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent5: The thief vamoosed into the darkness, disappearing without a trace.

meanings.sent1: The kids vamoosed from the playground when it started raining.
meanings.sent2: He vamoosed out of the meeting before anyone could ask him questions.
meanings.sent3: The students vamoosed from the classroom as soon as the bell rang.
meanings.sent4: The suspect vamoosed out the back door before the police arrived.
meanings.sent5: The bird vamoosed from its nest when it sensed danger nearby.
